Windlord:

"Run and come back when you like, I'll be waitting you here" replied 
Windlord while he saw BH ran "But I promise you that if you touch any 
of my friends, you will become the prey instead being the hunter.."

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "Soulstice Omega" <thecode@p...> wrote:
> Burning Hammer stepped backwards as Windlord struck at him with the
> hurricane of punches. Burning Hammer was starting to lose his cool, 
so he
> stepped backwards and fell back a few feet.
> 
> Burning Hammer: What's it to you? I'm a big successful hunter, what 
have you
> done in life? What is the matter with you anyway? I'd be more 
concerned
> about your friend. My message to you is this. I have took alot of 
damage,
> and need to retreat, to get reapired. But I will be back after some 
more
> preparation. Do not run from me. If you leave this place. I will 
track you
> down. You can't get away from me. I'll find you easily wherever you 
go, and
> not once will I lose track of you. Don't try to move into another 
base,
> because it'll prove inneffective. My tracking device assures me, 
that even
> if you move off planet, I can still track you down.
> 
> Burning Hammer laughed, it sounded like he was choking, because he 
was
> spitting up mech fluid at this point...
> 
> ----- Original Message -----
